      Just a simple linear search that uses nested for loops to search through for the rarity and name of the item main provides

        public void printBags()

      • fillArray

        public void fillArray()
        takes the array of strings provided and randomly selects items. splits them and creates objects of them. places those objects in a 2d array of [bags][slots].
